snippet: The suspected gunman who attacked Police Headquarters from inside an armored van and left bags filled with pipe bombs around the building was shot and killed by a police sniper.
abstract: Dallas authorities identify gunman who attacked Police Headquarters as James L Boulware; Boulware was found shot dead within armored van from which he carried out attack after being shot by sniper fire; assault led to 12-hour standoff between Boulware and police.

byline.original: By MANNY FERNANDEZ and ASHLEY SOUTHALL
byline.contributor: Manny Fernandez reported from Dallas, and Ashley Southall from New York. Patrick McGee contributed reporting from Dallas, and Katie Rogers from New York. Susan C. Beachy contributed research.

lead_paragraph: The suspected gunman who attacked Police Headquarters from inside an armored van and left bags filled with pipe bombs around the building was shot and killed by a police sniper.

headline.main: Dallas Gunman Killed After Attack on Police Headquarters
headline.print_headline: Suspect Dead After Gun and Bomb Attack on Dallas Police
